summary:
Peter Pan is a well-known character from books and movies, created by Scottish author J.M. Barrie. He is a young boy who can fly and never ages. Peter lives on an imaginary island called Neverland, where he has adventures with his friends, the Lost Boys. He interacts with fairies, pirates, and other magical creatures.

The story teaches us about staying young at heart and enjoying life's adventures. Peter Pan has inspired many movies, plays, and even a statue in Kensington Gardens, London. His image has become a symbol of childhood innocence and imagination.
title: Peter Pan
